column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I wasn't a fan of the pizza either.  The crust was not good at all.  It was very bland
column2: and lacking in flavor.  It was also extremely hard
column3: and seemed to be sopping in butter.  The waiter told me he accidentally gave me a butter crust even though I didn't order that
column4: but either way it would not have been good.
